topic.title: About ZeroUp (and ZeroUpUnlimited)
topic.body:
Could we have an option to search files by uploader and also have a way to make folders (medias, politics etc...).
Long live ZeroNet, Ithink it's the future of the Internet ;)

topic.title: ZeroLSTN
topic.body:
Hey, I'm ready to share all the music from this site. I also add musics in my free time: http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroLSTN.bit/?/album/Metallica/Kill%20%27Em%20All

Remember, it's important to share everything we have ;)
